subanswer.text: Since one busines suit costs '$100', thus if we denote its price with variable 'x'. Then according to problem statement, Flight Ticket(FT) would represent $(5*x+700). 1.subquestion: If I want to design an optimal strategy to ensure maximum sun exposure for my plants under cloudy weather conditions using grow lights, what should I do considering energy efficiency and plant health requirements? To optimize growth while ensuring energy efficiency during periods of prolonged cloudiness or limited daylight hours (e.g., winter months), consider implementing these strategies regarding your use of grow lights:

subanswer.text: Use LED grow lights due to their high energy efficiency and low heat emission compared to traditional HID lamps. Choose full spectrum light bulbs if possible; they mimic natural sunlight better, supporting photosynthesis across all necessary wavelengths required for various aspects of plant development such as flowering and vegetative stages. Position fixtures close enough without causing scorching but maintain sufficient distance between units when scaling up cultivation areas. Employ timers programmed according to specific species’ photoperiod needs—different crops may require different lengths ranging from minimal supplemental lighting only at dusk until dawn cycles extend beyond typical dayside duration available naturally outside growing facilities like greenhouses or indoor gardens. Consider incorporating smart technology systems capable of monitoring environmental parameters including humidity levels since excessive moisture encourages fungal diseases common within tightly
